Well, if I let you out and you start crying, I'ma pay a little visit to Irene.
translation.it: Se ti lascio uscire e ti metti a gridare, farò una visita a Irene.

translation.en: Make sure she all right, huh?
translation.it: Per vedere se sta bene, no?

translation.en: I take it you love Irene 'cause you ain't knocking no more.
translation.it: Immagino tu le voglia bene, visto che non scalci più.

translation.en: So when I open this up,
I want my conversation.
[man] Why don't we start from the beginning, make it simple? What's your name?
translation.it: Perché non cominciamo dall'inizio? Come ti chiami?

translation.en: -Huh? -I'm Robin! Oh, I can't hear you.
translation.it: - Robin. - Oh, non ti sento bene.

translation.en: -What is it? -[crying] Robin.
You push that Power, don't you? I don't know nothing about that--
translation.it: - Sei una spacciatrice di Power, no? - Non so niente.

translation.en: -You don't know? -No! I don't!
translation.it: - Non lo sai? - No! Non lo so!

translation.en: Maybe you'll figure it out, huh? You stay in there until you figure it out.
translation.it: Forse lo scoprirai. Starai lì finché non lo scopri.

translation.en: [Robin] I don't know!
What's the source?
-I don't know. -You don't know?
-Maybe you know something about Newt. -I don't-- I don't know--
translation.it: - Forse sai qualcosa di Newt. - Non lo so.

translation.en: -Oh, you don't know who Newt is? -No.
[man] That's funny because Newt be all in your phone.
translation.it: Buffo, perché hai molti suoi messaggi.

translation.en: I get weird texts from people all the time because that's what the job is.
translation.it: Ricevo sempre messaggi strani dalla gente, è questo il lavoro.

translation.en: Well, let me tell you what's even more weird.
translation.it: Ecco una cosa ancora più strana.

translation.en: -Newt ain't here no more. -What?
So since Newt ain't here, that leads us to... where to, huh?
translation.it: Visto che Newt non c'è, questo ci porta... dove?

translation.en: Where to, Robin? I need to know where the source is.
translation.it: Dove, Robin? Devo sapere chi è la fonte.

translation.en: [Robin sobbing] I don't-- Believe me!
-I said get out! -[sobbing]
[screams] Why? So you can advance your position in life.
translation.it: - Perché? - Diamo una svolta alla tua vita.

translation.en: Who is that?
-Hmm? Look closer, is that Biggie? -I don't know.
translation.it: - È lui Biggie? - Non lo so.

translation.en: -You don't know? -No, I don't know.
Oh, you on these streets, you don't know shit.
translation.it: Giri per le strade, ma non sai un cazzo.

translation.en: I know you're scared.
I know you're feeling like fight or flight, but I'ma tell you right now, you just breathe and get through it
translation.it: L'istinto ti dice di difenderti, ma devi respirare e affrontarlo,

translation.en: because listen, you don't know who I am and what I'm about,
translation.it: perché non sai chi sono e come sono fatto,

translation.en: but I got to find that source.
translation.it: ma io devo trovare quella fonte.

translation.en: I need to get to the top of the food chain.
But you keep messing around with me and acting like you don't know shit,
translation.it: Ma se continui a fingere di non sapere niente,

translation.en: I'm gonna knock your ass out, and then I'm gonna go kill your mother.
translation.it: ti spacco la faccia e vado a uccidere tua madre.

translation.en: I'ma kill Irene.
Look me in my eyes.
Am I lying?
So tell me your decision.
translation.it: Allora dimmi cos'hai deciso di fare.

translation.en: [man] There's our buyer.
[woman] You trust her?
She's connected to every cartel in South America.
translation.it: È legata a tutti i cartelli sudamericani.

translation.en: She's the real deal.
And the money?
You'll get it.
Then our backers will see what the rest of us have already seen.
translation.it: E i nostri finanziatori capiranno ciò che noi già sappiamo.

translation.en: What's that?
That we're working for the woman who's gonna change the world.
translation.it: Che lavoriamo per la donna che cambierà il mondo.

translation.en: [man] Bienvenidos.
Welcome. I see you packed light.
I was expecting...
duffel bags. The money is here...
translation.it: - borsoni da viaggio. - Ho i soldi...

translation.en: if the product lives up to its reputation.
Product?
It is not just a product. These pills will topple governments.
translation.it: Non è solo un prodotto. Queste pillole fanno cadere i governi.

translation.en: You're about to become the most powerful woman in South America.
translation.it: Sta per diventare la donna più potente del Sud America.

translation.en: In that case, I look forward to your demonstration.
translation.it: In tal caso, attendo con ansia la vostra dimostrazione.

translation.en: Hey, I see what you doin'. Give me this.
translation.it: Ehi, ho capito che vuoi fare! Dammelo.

translation.en: You do what I told you.
No messing around.
[man] Operator.
[Robin] Hi.
I was told to call this number if I ever had a problem.
translation.it: Mi hanno detto di chiamare questo numero, in caso di problemi.

translation.en: [man] Go to Hong Kong Market off of Patterson.
translation.it: Vai all'Hong Kong Market, sulla Patterson.

translation.en: Go to the back and ask for alligator wine.
translation.it: Vai sul retro e chiedi del vino di alligatore.

translation.en: Come alone.
-[Robin] Okay. -[phone beeps]
[man] You're gonna go meet whoever's in there,
you're gonna tell them what we talked about.
translation.it: e gli dirai ciò che abbiamo concordato.

translation.en: You're gonna tell them that you saw me and that I left.
translation.it: Gli dirai che mi hai visto e che me ne sono andato.

translation.en: -No-- -And if they ask...
No, you said point you in a direction, that's a direction.
translation.it: No. Hai detto di indicarti la via, eccola.

translation.en: You ever hear of a mine rat?
-It sound like a rat that get blown up. -Well, that's what you are.
translation.it: - Un ratto che viene fatto esplodere? - È questo che sei.

translation.en: You're my mine rat.
Look, I was just trying to make ends meet. I'm just a kid, I'm--
translation.it: Cerco solo di sbarcare il lunario. Sono una ragazzina...

translation.en: I know what you trying to do!
You out here in these streets dealing, you ain't no damn kid.
translation.it: Vai in giro a spacciare, non sei una ragazzina.

translation.en: You gave that up.
You can't keep playing that whole "I'm just a child" card, okay?
translation.it: Non puoi continuare a giocare la carta della ragazzina, ok?

translation.en: Let's make it happen.
Yes, sir.
-[Robin] Excuse me. -[phone keys tapping]
Excuse me.
Alligator wine?
That's not a thing.
Can you just ask somebody?
[woman] He said wait here.
Excuse me, could you help me out with this?
What?
-Is it spicy, is it mild? -I don't know what the fuck it is. I don't work here.
translation.it: - È piccante o dolce? - Che cazzo ne so, non lavoro qui.

translation.en: Watch your step.
Okay, why don't you have a seat?
How'd you get the number?
Newt gave it to me.
[man] You're a dealer.
Yeah, he gave it to me in case something went wrong.
translation.it: Sì, me l'ha dato in caso di problemi.

translation.en: [man] Newt's dead.
[Robin] I know.
How'd that happen?
There's this guy.
He calls himself "The Major."
He killed him.
Then he threw me in his trunk.
He's right outside.
Can I go?
You should stay right here.
This is the safest place for you right now.
translation.it: È il posto più sicuro per te.

translation.en: You Biggie?
I'm not Biggie.
Biggie works in sales. This is distribution.
translation.it: Biggie pensa alle vendite. Noi distribuiamo.

translation.en: -Talk to me. -[man] Listen, I can...
I don't want to talk to any middle men. Already did that.
You don't tell me where Biggie is, I'll cut your fucking head off.
translation.it: Dimmi dov'è Biggie o ti taglio la testa!

translation.en: Start the truck!
[Robin screams] Let me out!
Hey!
[man] Hey, Robin!
You still in there?
-You all right? -[Robin] Yeah. Yeah.
Don't worry, okay? I'm gonna come--
[whispers] Everything's okay.
Baby.
It's so good to see you.
What? What?
Cover your ears.
What's that?
They're logging Powers. There's chips in every capsule.
translation.it: Tracciano la Power. C'è un chip in ogni capsula.

translation.en: The government won't let them test it, so they test it on us.
translation.it: Il governo non glielo permette, quindi la testano su di noi.

translation.en: The people that you're selling to,
translation.it: Le persone a cui la vendi...

translation.en: they're the lab rats.
-[beeping] -[Robin] What's all that?
[man] It's a demonstration for potential buyers.
It means they're done with New Orleans. It means I'm running out of time.
translation.it: Hanno chiuso con New Orleans. Mi resta poco tempo.

translation.en: -I gotta go there. -[tone sounding]
You gotta take me there.
Tracy, take...
[Robin screams] Help!
Help!
Help!
[man] Robin, I need...
Please.
You killed my cousin.
He ODed. I didn't kill him.
translation.it: È andato in overdose. Non l'ho ucciso.

translation.en: I got money.
Please.
I'm just trying-- I'm just trying to find my daughter.
translation.it: Sto solo... Sto solo cercando mia figlia.

translation.en: Yo, chill.
Yo, you need to calm down.
You fell out, I brought you to the vet. My mom work here.
translation.it: Sei dal veterinario. Mia madre lavora qui.

translation.en: You did this?
Yeah.
But now I need to finish the exit wound.
You gonna let me do it or not?
translation.it: Me lo lasci fare o no?

translation.en: I guess that's a yes.
Wait, wait, wait.
What?
Y'all work on humans? Nope.
I didn't even do nothing yet.
[woman] There a lot of girls that look just like her!
[man] Mrs. Reilly, do you want your daughter to end up dead?
translation.it: Sig.ra Reilly, vuole che sua figlia finisca ammazzata?

translation.en: I already told you, I don't know where she is.
translation.it: Ve l'ho detto, non so dove sia.

translation.en: She was supposed to be home hours ago. What...
translation.it: Ormai dovrebbe essere a casa. Cosa...

translation.en: With all due respect, officer, there's a lot of girls--
translation.it: Con tutto il rispetto, molte ragazze...

translation.en: [man] This could get very ugly for your daughter
translation.it: Potrebbe finire male per sua figlia

translation.en: -and for you. -[woman] Are you sure it was her?
translation.it: - e per lei. - Sicuri fosse lei?

translation.en: Are you sure you're not mistaken?
[man] Are you sure you haven't seen this man before?
translation.it: È sicura di non aver visto quest'uomo?

translation.en: [woman] No, I told you I don't know what you talking about.
translation.it: No, non so di cosa parliate!

translation.en: [man] That's funny.
We have surveillance footage of your daughter with this man tonight
translation.it: Abbiamo un video di sorveglianza di sua figlia con quest'uomo

translation.en: committing crimes about five miles from here.
Are you sure?
This could get a whole lot uglier for you.
Honey, bear. Are we all out of that one hippie shampoo that--
translation.it: Tesoro! Abbiamo ancora quello shampoo che...

translation.en: Whoa! What the shit's going on here? Who the hell are you guys?
translation.it: Che succede qui? Chi diavolo siete?

translation.en: What you doing in my bathroom?
-[man] We're the police. Who are you? -Man, I live here.
translation.it: - Siamo la polizia. E lei? - Io vivo qui.

translation.en: Babe, I'm sorry I was in your shower. The pressure's so much better in yours.
translation.it: Tesoro, scusa se ho usato la tua doccia. La pressione è migliore.

translation.en: Can you come over here?
I'm really sorry it had to happen that way.
translation.it: Mi dispiace che sia successo così.

translation.en: Robin sent me.
Let me just handle these guys, okay?
translation.it: Lasci che me ne occupi io, ok?

translation.en: Officers.
What precinct did you guys say you're from? They didn't say.
translation.it: - Da che distretto avete detto che venite? - Non l'hanno detto.

translation.en: Sir, Mrs. Reilly and her daughter
translation.it: La sig.ra Reilly e sua figlia

translation.en: seem to be the only residents registered to this address.
translation.it: sono le uniche residenti a questo indirizzo.

translation.en: I see.
So now because I'm not in your little database, I can't...
translation.it: Visto che non sono nel tuo stupido database, non posso...

translation.en: -[sneezes] -Bless you.
-[sneezes] -Is there a cat in here?
I thought you said you lived here.
-[cat meows] -Yes, I do, sir.
Is that so hard to believe? Why?
translation.it: È così difficile da credere? Perché?

translation.en: Is it because I'm white?
Are you assuming that me and this beautiful Black woman wouldn't be able to share a happy home?
translation.it: Credi che io e questa bella donna nera non possiamo essere felici?

translation.en: You wanna say that on camera?
-Babe, where's your phone? -Got it.
All right. Well, let's just see about this.
translation.it: Va bene. Allora vediamo un po'.

translation.en: -And we are live streaming. -[phone beeps] Now, let's just get this on record.
Honey, did either of these men show you a warrant when they came into our house?
translation.it: Tesoro, ti hanno mostrato un mandato quando sono entrati?

translation.en: No, they did not.
Uh-huh. And did either of them show you a badge? No! Can I see your badges?
translation.it: - Ti hanno mostrato i distintivi? - No. Me li mostrate?

translation.en: Gentlemen. Thank you for your time, Mrs. Reilly.
translation.it: - Signori. - Grazie del suo tempo, sig.ra Reilly.

translation.en: [woman] I'm sorry, do I know you?
You got any duct tape?
Duct tape? What?
Stop! Who are you?
My name is Detective Frank Shaver, NOPD.
translation.it: Sono il detective Frank Shaver, NOPD.

translation.en: Can I see your badge?
Well, I don't have it on me.
Where do you have it?
Mrs. Reilly, your daughter and I have had a professional friendship
translation.it: Io e sua figlia abbiamo un'amicizia professionale

translation.en: for a little over half a year now.
translation.it: da poco più di sei mesi.

translation.en: She's a very smart and good-hearted young person,
translation.it: È una ragazza intelligente e di buon cuore,

translation.en: but she is mixed up in some things she shouldn't be, and I am trying to help her.
translation.it: ma è invischiata in alcune cose losche e io voglio aiutarla.

translation.en: Thank you. I'm gonna need this too.
Where's yours?
[man] So what's your power?
I don't even know.
Come on. You ain't tried it?
Honestly...
I saw a girl OD.
You know, on the streets, they're talking about how it'll give you superpowers,
translation.it: Sai, per strada parlano di come ti dia i superpoteri,

translation.en: but not about how one hit could kill you.
translation.it: ma non di come possa ucciderti.

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, if you’re so spooked,
why you still in the game?
What happened to getting good grades and staying in school?
translation.it: Perché non pensi ai voti e alla scuola?

translation.en: Yo, I wish I could get good grades.
Go to school, get to college, get some fancy-ass job.
translation.it: Studiare, andare al college e trovare un buon lavoro.

translation.en: But I need money now. Everybody need money now.
translation.it: - Ma mi servono soldi adesso. - Come a tutti.

translation.en: Well, my mother has diabetes now. And we don't got no health insurance.
translation.it: Beh, mia madre ha il diabete. E nessuna assicurazione sanitaria.

translation.en: And she needs surgery, the expensive kind, so what else am I supposed to do?
translation.it: Le serve un intervento costoso, cos'altro dovrei fare?

translation.en: Oh, that's easy.
-What? -Go to the Army.
-What, it don't trip you up killing fools? -Yeah, it tripped me up.
translation.it: - Uccidere non ti segna? - Sì, mi ha segnato.

translation.en: But that was my skill set.
translation.it: Ma è quello che so fare.

translation.en: And what did the system do? It took advantage of me.
translation.it: E il sistema che ha fatto? Mi ha usato.

translation.en: But I know now I got to work the system harder than it's working me.
translation.it: Ora so che devo fregare il sistema più di quanto lui freghi me.

translation.en: That's what you gotta do.
You're young, you're Black, you're a woman.
translation.it: Sei giovane, sei nera, sei una donna.

translation.en: The system is designed to swallow you whole.
translation.it: Il sistema è progettato per inghiottirti.

translation.en: You gotta find out what you do better than anybody else and rock that.
translation.it: Devi scoprire cosa sai fare meglio di chiunque altro.

translation.en: So what you gonna do? Hmm?
How you gonna leave your mark?
I rap.
I'm sorry. Well, what's your rap name then, huh?
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Qual è il tuo nome d'arte?

translation.en: What you gonna be, the next Cardi B?
Huh? Cardi C?
Well, go ahead and spit then. You say you rap, let me hear one line.
translation.it: Fammi vedere che sai fare. Dici che fai rap, fammi sentire.

translation.en: Huh? You can't spit one line?
I don't like doing it in front of people. How you gonna to be a rapper if you got stage fright?
translation.it: - Non mi piace farlo in pubblico. - Hai ansia da palcoscenico?

translation.en: You know what I think? Most time, people don't wanna do something
translation.it: Sai cosa? Quando qualcuno non vuole fare qualcosa

translation.en: is 'cause they're probably just wack at it.
translation.it: è perché in realtà fa schifo.

translation.en: If you wack, just say you wack.
translation.it: Se fai schifo, dillo e basta.

translation.en: Fine, give me a word.
Give you a word? What you talking about?
[Robin] I'm gonna go off the top, give me a word.
Oh, you that good, huh?
Feline.
Feline.
♪ I'm 'bout to make a beeline ♪
translation.it: Ho la mira di un cecchino

translation.en: ♪ And every single accolade for spitting 'Bout to be mine ♪
translation.it: Ogni premio per il rap Sarà sul mio comodino

translation.en: ♪ I'ma go from old shit and goodwill To design ♪
translation.it: La mia vita cambierà Salirò quello scalino

translation.en: ♪ I'ma be rocking Dior like Dion I'm Celine ♪
translation.it: Indosserò Dior come la Dion Sono Celine

translation.en: ♪ Or maybe I meant Céline ♪ ♪ I'm feeling really cuh-lean ♪
translation.it: O forse intendevo Céline Sarò una star come Chaplin

translation.en: ♪ Can someone tell them other boys A real MC is coming, no humming ♪
translation.it: Andate in giro a dire Che una vera MC sta per arrivare

translation.en: ♪ My name already chose a different bird ♪
translation.it: Ho il nome di un uccello

translation.en: ♪ I killed your lil freestyle Give me another word ♪
translation.it: Il mio freestyle spacca Dammi un'altra parola, bello

translation.en: Give me another word.
Seismograph.
♪ Dude trying to trip me up With his seismograph ♪
translation.it: Vuoi mettermi in difficoltà Col tuo sismografo

translation.en: ♪ I think it's funny I can't pick a better time to laugh ♪
translation.it: Ma mentre guido Neanche guardo il tachigrafo

translation.en: ♪ I'll find the path ♪
♪ You don't know all the rhymes I have ♪
♪ The only thing that don't sit well Within this mind ♪ ♪ Is math ♪
translation.it: Non riuscirai mai a fare del mio cervello Un colabrodo

translation.en: Antibiotic.
Antibiotic.
♪ I might need an anti-psychotic I'm going crazy ♪
translation.it: Forse mi serve un antipsicotico Sto impazzendo

translation.en: ♪ NOLA made me And this flow, I got it ♪
♪ I been about it Even if my mental space is crowded ♪
translation.it: Mi serve uno scarico Per il mio cervello sovraccarico

translation.en: ♪ I keep it in because a guilty dog Gonna bark the loudest ♪
translation.it: Resisto perché so Che non andrò nel panico

translation.en: ♪ My mom's the proudest I know that we can make it out if ♪
♪ We made it through a flood I bet we gonna get through the drought ♪
translation.it: Alluvione, siccità Niente distruggerà il mio spirito

translation.en: ♪ I may be little, but in these waters you won't catch me drowning ♪
translation.it: Sono giovane Ma mi prenderò ciò che merito

translation.en: ♪ One day I'll swim in all them Dollar bills I'ma be counting ♪
translation.it: Un giorno farò i soldi E sarà qualcosa di inedito

translation.en: You smoked that.
All right.
You're good, damn good.
That's your power.
You take that, you leverage that,
translation.it: Se lo prendi, se lo sfrutti,

translation.en: you use your power to take the system down.
translation.it: puoi usarlo per abbattere il sistema.

translation.en: All right.
And what's this?
You gotta take four of them.
This says for dogs.
Yeah, well, you a big dog.
translation.it: Sì, beh... tu sei un mastino.

translation.en: ♪ 'Bout to make a million For all my, all my, all my ♪
Well, where you going now?
-Remember that guy in the picture? -Yeah.
-Gotta find him. -[door slams]
He took something from me. I gotta get it back.
translation.it: Ha qualcosa di mio. Me lo riprenderò.

translation.en: Something or someone?
-We ain't done here. -Give me--
Listen, don't press your luck.
I could navigate for you. You're going to where the dots on the screen is.
translation.it: Posso aiutarti. Segui i puntini sullo schermo?

translation.en: I can take you there.
For ten grand. Why the hell would I pay you $10,000 for anything?
translation.it: - Per 10.000 dollari. - Perché dovrei pagarti tanto?

translation.en: Medical expenses, keeping your ass alive, kidnapping fee.
translation.it: Spese mediche, l'averti salvato il culo, oneri di rapimento.

translation.en: Give me those keys.
I'd say I done you a lot of solids here.
All right.
-Two. -Five.
So, this is your daughter, Tracy.
translation.it: Quindi questa è tua figlia, Tracy.

translation.en: Yeah.
She look like you.
And you think that guy with the beard took her?
translation.it: E il tizio con la barba l'ha presa?

translation.en: You ever hear of Teleios? No.
translation.it: - Hai mai sentito parlare di Teleios? - No.

translation.en: What's that? Defense contractor.
translation.it: - Che cos'è? - Un appaltatore della difesa.

translation.en: They were the ones who cracked the codes back in the day.
translation.it: Sono stati loro a inventare la Power.

translation.en: -[camera clicking] -Grabbed a bunch of Rangers,
translation.it: Ci hanno presi, messi in una stanza

translation.en: put 'em all in the room, filled them up with radiation.
translation.it: Ci hanno presi, messi in una stanza e riempiti di radiazioni.

translation.en: Messed with their genes.
Tried to turn us into superheroes.
Why'd they wanna make superheroes? They didn't. Not really.
translation.it: - Perché volevano dei supereroi? - Non è proprio così.

translation.en: 'Cause in the real world, the power goes to where it always goes,
translation.it: Nel mondo reale, il potere va dove va sempre,

translation.en: to the people that already have it.
translation.it: ossia alle persone che lo hanno già.

translation.en: Okay. So, what's your power?
translation.it: Ok. Allora, qual è il tuo potere?

translation.en: I know you took it.
I tried it once.
Damn near killed me, hurt a lot of people.
translation.it: Sono quasi morto, ferendo molte persone.

translation.en: So I said I'm not trying that shit no more.
translation.it: Così ho deciso di non farlo più.

translation.en: A few years later, Tracy came along.
translation.it: Qualche anno dopo, è arrivata Tracy.

translation.en: I knew she was different though.
When she was young, she never got sick or anything like that.
translation.it: Quando era piccola, non si è mai ammalata.

translation.en: As she got older, she got stronger.
She exhibited symptoms of...
powers. But she never had to take a pill.
translation.it: poteri. Senza aver mai preso una pillola.

translation.en: Fetal alcohol syndrome.
If you got, like, beaucoup shit in your system, maybe it got passed down to her.
translation.it: Se hai delle stronzate nell'organismo, forse gliele hai passate.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Yeah, you hood, but you smart, huh?
translation.it: Ok. Giri per strada ma sei intelligente, eh?

translation.en: Anyway, when Teleios caught wind of Tracy,
translation.it: Quando la Teleios ha saputo di Tracy,

translation.en: they wanted to experiment on her like they did on me.
translation.it: volevano sperimentare di su lei, come con me.

translation.en: And that's when we just took off.
I'm sorry.
Are you okay?
Put your seat belt on.
-I got my seat belt on. -No, you don't. Put your seat belt on!
translation.it: - Ce l'ho. - Non è vero. Metti la cintura.

translation.en: Somebody's following us.
-[Tracy and Robin] Nobody's following us. -Hold on.
-Keep your head down. -Okay, okay, okay!
This voice, do what I tell you to do, okay?

punk?

the pistol shrimp.

translation.en: Eight thousand degrees hotter than the surface of the sun.

rips the flesh right off the bone.

it's just Mr. Shrimp sitting there, eating...

translation.en: anything that's left.
Yeah, so?
So...

Let's go.
